name: Bhopal Badminton Club
description: Premier badminton club in Bhopal. We organize regular sessions for players of all levels.

description: Community of fitness lovers. We do morning walks, runs, yoga, and outdoor activities.

description: Football enthusiasts unite! Regular matches, tournaments, and practice sessions.

description: Find your inner peace. We conduct yoga, meditation, and mindfulness sessions.

name: Elite Sports Bhopal
description: Premium sports club offering basketball, tennis, and swimming. Membership required.
